statements: SELECT * FROM multimedia_content ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM multimedia_content WHERE content_type = 'image';
SELECT content_title, content_url FROM multimedia_content WHERE content_type = 'video' ORDER BY content_size ASC;
SELECT content_id, content_title, upload_date FROM multimedia_content WHERE content_size > 5000;
SELECT * FROM multimedia_content WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT content_id, content_title FROM multimedia_content;
SELECT * FROM multimedia_content WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT content_title, content_type, content_url FROM multimedia_content WHERE content_type='video';
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_url FROM multimedia_content ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, content_size FROM multimedia_content WHERE content_size > 1000;
SELECT id, url FROM images;
SELECT url, alt_text FROM images;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT id, title FROM videos ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE size < 100;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, url, alt_text FROM images WHERE size > 100;
SELECT title, duration FROM videos WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, url, size FROM images WHERE alt_text LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT url, title FROM videos WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_content WHERE type='image';
SELECT id, title FROM media_content WHERE id=1;
SELECT title, type, url FROM media_content WHERE id=3;
SELECT * FROM media_content ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT id, video_url, duration FROM videos WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM media_content WHERE type = 'image';
SELECT id, title FROM media_content WHERE type = 'video' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT title, url FROM media_content ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, image_url, resolution FROM images WHERE resolution = 'HD' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, video_url, duration FROM videos WHERE duration > 300 ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM Images
SELECT image_name, image_url FROM Images
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_size FROM Images WHERE image_size > 100
SELECT * FROM Videos ORDER BY video_duration DESC
SELECT tag_name FROM Tags
SELECT image_name FROM Images WHERE image_size > 1000 ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE video_duration < 120 ORDER BY video_name ASC;
SELECT image_name, image_url FROM Images WHERE image_id = 5;
SELECT video_name, video_duration FROM Videos GROUP BY video_duration HAVING COUNT(video_id) > 1 ORDER BY video_name DESC;
SELECT audio_name, audio_duration FROM AudioFiles WHERE audio_duration BETWEEN 60 AND 180 ORDER BY audio_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM images
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM images WHERE upload_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT video_id, video_url, duration FROM videos WHERE video_description LIKE '%tutorial%'
SELECT u.username, u.email, ua.action FROM users u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.activity_date = '2021-10-10'
SELECT a.audio_url, a.audio_description, ua.action FROM audio_files a JOIN user_activity ua ON a.audio_id = ua.activity_id
